ResearchProjectDef.label: UAC Nano Beds
ResearchProjectDef.description: A medical bed invented by the UAC that has an automatic machine that injects the patient with perishable healing nano-bots.

ResearchProjectDef.label: MFS Cell
ResearchProjectDef.description: Invented by Dr. Malcolm Betruger on Mars City shortly before the industrial accident that sadly caused a catastrophic installation failure. An industrial accident of the likes Mars has never seen.
